data.title: Meet the Team Lincoln, NE
data.meta_description: Our expert staff is committed to providing quality health care and educational so that, we can make sure our pets are healthy, happy and living their best lives.
data.text:
Sam Rogge

DVM, Medical Director

Dr. Rogge is a Nebraska native who was born and raised in the Lincoln area. He attended the University of Nebraska-Lincoln for his undergraduate studies and obtained a Bachelor’s degree in Biology. He attended veterinary school through the University of Nebraska-Lincoln/Iowa State University – College of Veterinary Medicine joint program and graduated in May of 2020. Since graduating he has worked as an emergency veterinarian in Omaha and is now transitioning into general practice as his family continues to grow. Outside of work he enjoys spending time with his wife and kids especially doing outdoor activities, such as hiking, fishing and golfing.

Matt Talbot

DVM

Dr. Talbot is a dedicated practitioner known for his passion for animal care and mentorship, with over two decades of veterinary experience. Originally from Gordon, NE, he graduated from Kansas State University with his doctorate in veterinary medicine. At home, he enjoys life with his wife, Laura, and their three cats, Milton, Walter, and Oliver. Dr. Talbot also enjoys music and outdoor activities. His commitment to providing excellent and compassionate care enriches our clinic daily!

Squeaks

Clinic Cat

Meet Squeaks, the reigning monarch of our clinic! This rotund tabby has been gracing our halls since 2021 with her royal presence. With a penchant for napping in sunbeams and indulging in treats, Squeaks knows how to live the good life. But don’t let her regal demeanor fool you, she’s also a mischievous troublemaker, especially when her partner in crime, Simon, is involved. Catch her in action during her catnip-fueled antics or witness her expertly execute her favorite prank on our practice manager by toppling Sarah’s water bottle when she’s not looking. Long live Queen Squeaks!

Simon

Clinic Cat

Simon, the dapper addition to our clinic’s feline crew! This debonair grey gentleman joined us in 2023 and has been stealing hearts ever since. Simon isn’t just a handsome face, he’s also an active enthusiast of the fetch game and a dedicated greeter of both our feline patients and their human companions. When he’s not strutting around like he owns the place (which, let’s be honest, he kind of does), you can find him lending a helping paw on our practice manager’s desk.

Sarah S.

Practice Manager

With ACC since 2022

Hometown: Bellevue, NE

Family: Partner, Dan

Pets: Dog: Piper | Cats: Danica, Tonks, and Whiskey | 6 chickens | 7 ducks | bees

Hobbies: Homesteading/gardening, bee keeping, running with Piper, and raising money for the Alzheimer’s Association.

Fun Fact: I have an Associates Degrees in Radio Production, Promotions, Sales and Web Design, a Minor in Chemistry, and a Bachelor’s in Biology.

Ashley

Licensed Veterinary Technician

With ACC since 2017

Hometown: Malcolm, NE

Pets: Dogs: Daisy, Poppy, and Cedar | Cats: Petunia and Cactus | Horse: Capone

Hobbies: Traveling, art, and dog shows.

Fun Fact: I have traveled to 13 countries.

Tiffany

Veterinary Assistant

With ACC since 2019

Hometown: Raymond, NE

Pets: Dogs: Addie Bean and Saxxon | Cats: Dexter, Maxwell, and Stewart | 2 Horses | 1 Chinchilla

Family: 2 girls

Hobbies: Trail riding, traveling, volleyball, and gardening.

Fun Fact: I have a Cosmetology and Piercing License.

Veterinary Assistant

With ACC since 2023

Pets: Dog: Reggie | Cat: Sullivan

Fun Fact: My family has a non-profit that helps fund research, promote education, and give public awareness to suicide.

Fun Fact: Works full time at the zoo since 2005

Fun Fact: I love Jesus & animals.

Fun Fact: I was a professional bowler once.

Nikki K

Feline Groomer

With ACC since 2017

Hometown: Lincoln, NE

Pets: Dogs: Diesel, Savannah, and Tank | Cats: Gracie Lou Freebush, Percy Jackson and Stormy

Hobbies: Volleyball, going to the gym, and spending time with my family
